timeline.bodyText:
Good solution to the issue, to just go ahead and simplify it 👍
We only need to update the screenshot to use the colours that we're setting here.
timeline.author: JonLavi

timeline.bodyText: Good spot on this, it was quite a sneaky bug!
timeline.author: JonLavi
Rachael-E
Rachael-E

replies.bodyText: @Rachael-E At our review meeting on Friday, the samples team confirmed that we'll remove the colour picking functionality. Setting the colours explicitly in this sample shows off the ability to configure the colours of the viewshed areas without impacting the other samples.
replies.author: sclaridge
